name: craigslist_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries on Craigslist in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling craigslist_search multiple times - it is faster and more efficient.

detailSteps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('.cl-search-result, .result-row, .cl-static-search-result').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 20) { const titleEl = el.querySelector('a.posting-title, a.result-title, .titlestring, a.cl-app-anchor'); const priceEl = el.querySelector('.priceinfo, .result-price'); const metaEl = el.querySelector('.meta, .result-date'); const dateEl = el.querySelector('time'); results.push({ title: titleEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', url: titleEl?.href || '', price: priceEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', date: dateEl?.textContent?.trim() || metaEl?.textContent?.trim() || '' }); } }); return { result_count: results.length, results };
detailSteps.name: results
detailSteps.label: Extract
